verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; with the Nehiloth. A Psalm of David. Give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H561>words<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, <S%H995>Consider<s%> my <S%H1901>meditation<s%>.
Hearken <S%H7181><s%> unto the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H7773>cry<s%>, my <S%H4428>King<s%>, and my <S%H430>God<s%>; For unto thee do I <S%H6419>pray<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> shalt thou <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%>; In the <S%H1242>morning<s%> will I <S%H6186>order<s%> my prayer unto <S%H6822>thee<s%>, and will keep watch.
For thou art not a <S%H410>God<s%> that hath <S%H2655>pleasure<s%> in <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>: <S%H7451>Evil<s%> shall not sojourn with <S%H1481>thee<s%>.
The <S%H1984>arrogant<s%> shall not <S%H3320>stand<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>: Thou <S%H8130>hatest<s%> all <S%H6466>workers<s%> of <S%H205>iniquity<s%>.
Thou wilt <S%H6>destroy<s%> them that <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H3577>lies<s%>: <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8581>abhorreth<s%> the <S%H1818>blood-thirsty<s%> and <S%H4820>deceitful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>.

But as for <S%H7230>me<s%>, in the abundance of thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> will I <S%H935>come<s%> into thy <S%H1004>house<s%>: In thy <S%H3374>fear<s%> will I <S%H7812>worship<s%> toward thy <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>.
Lead <S%H5148><s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, in thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> because of mine <S%H8324>enemies<s%>; Make thy <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H3474>straight<s%> before my <S%H6440>face<s%>.

For there is no <S%H3559>faithfulness<s%> in their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; Their <S%H7130>inward<s%> part is very <S%H1942>wickedness<s%>; Their <S%H1627>throat<s%> is an <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%>; They <S%H2505>flatter<s%> with their <S%H3956>tongue<s%>.

Hold them <S%H816>guilty<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; Let them <S%H5307>fall<s%> by their own <S%H4156>counsels<s%>; Thrust them <S%H5080>out<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>; For they have rebelled against <S%H4784>thee<s%>.

But let all those that take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in thee <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, Let them <S%H5769>ever<s%> shout for <S%H7442>joy<s%>, because thou <S%H5526>defendest<s%> <S%H157>them<s%>: Let them also that love thy <S%H8034>name<s%> be joyful in <S%H5970>thee<s%>.
For thou wilt <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>; O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, thou wilt <S%H5849>compass<s%> him with <S%H7522>favor<s%> as with a <S%H6793>shield<s%>.
